TypeSignature.Value: public interface IDelegateEvent<TDelegate> where TDelegate : Delegate
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IDelegateEvent`1<(class System.Delegate) TDelegate>

Docs.summary: First class event values for arbitrary delegate types.
Docs.remarks: F# gives special status to member properties compatible with type IDelegateEvent and tagged with the CLIEventAttribute. In this case the F# compiler generates appropriate CLI metadata to make the member appear to other CLI languages as a CLI event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void AddHandler(!TDelegate handler) cil managed

Docs.param: A delegate to be invoked when the event is fired.
Docs.summary: Connect a handler delegate object to the event. A handler can be later removed using RemoveHandler. The listener will be invoked when the event is fired.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void RemoveHandler(!TDelegate handler) cil managed

Docs.param: The delegate to be removed from the event listener store.
Docs.summary: Remove a listener delegate from an event listener store.
